summary: TRIED TO BRAKE FOR A FAMILY OF GEESE CROSSING THE ROAD.  FOLLOWING THE BRAKING, I NOTICED A PROBLEM WITH THE BRAKES AND THE CAR PULLING TO THE LEFT.  THE CAR WAS ALSO MAKING AN UNUSUAL NOISE.  AFTER SLOWLY DRIVING THE CAR TO THE REPAIR SHOP, IT WAS DETERMINED THAT THE RIGHT FRONT BRAKE ROTOR WAS BROKEN.    *TR
